title._content: Image taken from page 221 of 'The Works of G. J. Whyte-Melville. Edited by Sir H. Maxwell. [With illustrations by J. B. Partridge, Hugh Thomson, and others.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Works of G. J. Whyte-Melville. Edited by Sir H. Maxwell. [With illustrations by J. B. Bernard - Sir Contributor: THOMSON, Hugh. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012272.g." Volume: 16 Page: 221 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: W. Thacker & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002454853 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
